Description

Who are we?

Tripledot Studios was founded by a team of industry veterans from some of the biggest names in mobile games such as King, Peak Games, Facebook, and Product Madness.

We are now a 500 person mobile games studio, headquartered in London, with offices in Warsaw, Barcelona, Minsk, Jakarta and Melbourne.
The Financial Times awarded Tripledot the Fastest Growing Business in Europe in 2022
Tripledot won Tech Growth Business of the Year 2021 and 2023
PocketGamer just awarded us Best Mobile Developer 2023
We are a record breaking, chart-topping mobile games studio that is currently leading in the Casual mobile gaming space.

Our guiding principle as a team is that when people love what they do, what they do will be loved by others.

The studio is filled with people who love taking things apart and figuring out how they work. We enjoy problem-solving and most importantly, we LOVE making games!

Take a look at our games: iOS Store + Google Play

Role Overview

As we continue to scale globally, we are now seeking a talented Quality Assurance Engineer to join our team in Jakarta to focus on our game Piper's Pet Cafe. You will be responsible for ensuring the highest level of product quality. Your pivotal role in the QA Team will ensure that the quality of your work impacts millions of players daily and significantly contributes to the success of our games.

Key Responsibilities

Participate in the full cycle of the product: from requirements discussions to post-release activities
Write and execute test cases based on application logic
Review logs using tools such as Charles, Mac console, and Android Studio
Report changes seen both in the app and in developer messages
Ensure the highest quality of the product

Required Skills, Knowledge and Expertise

Have strong knowledge (3+ years of experience) in mobile testing, including ads and payments testing
Experience with Charles, Postman, Android Studio, xCode, Jira, TestRail
Knowledge of basic MySQL syntax and analytic tools like Firebase
Excellent English communication skills (C1 level)

Working at Tripledot

24 days holiday: 12 Days in your first year but then enjoy 24 days of paid holiday to relax and refresh throughout the year, in addition to national & bank holidays.
Hybrid Working: We work in the office 3 days a week, Tuesdays and Wednesdays, and a third day of your choice.
20 days fully remote working: Work from anywhere in the world, 20 days of the year.
Regular company events and rewards: Join in regular events and rewards that celebrate cultural events, our achievements and our team spirit.
Breakfast & Lunch: Relish daily provided breakfast and lunch to keep you fueled and focused.
BPJS HEALTH: Elevate your well-being and peace of mind, ensuring robust health security with seamless enrolment in BPJS Health!
BPJS SOCIAL: Secure your employment rights with BPJS Social.
Festivity Allowance: Celebrate festive occasions with an additional festive allowance.
Health Insurance: Stay covered with comprehensive health insurance for you and your loved ones.
Employee Assistance Program: Anytime you need it, tap into confidential, caring support with our Employee Assistance Program, always here to lend an ear and a helping hand.
Family Forming Support: Receive vital support on your family forming/ fertility journey with our support program [subject to policy]

About Tripledot Studios
We are Tripledot Studios, a fast-growing studio, lead by a team of industry veterans from some of the biggest names in mobile games. Our mission is to bring the knowledge and experience of a chart-topping mobile games company into a close-knit, collaborative environment. Our teams drive projects together from conception to launch in an indie-style process combining creativity and data to make games that can be enjoyed by everyone. We are guided by the belief that when we love what we do!

The Tripledot team is made up of incredible people with experience at some of the biggest companies in gaming. We are serial creators, always working on one pet project or another, and collaborate closely to bring those projects to life. Here at Tripledot Studios, we are building the Apollo program of games, finding the best of the best and empowering them to do what they do best. That’s the only way you reach the stars.

We embrace diversity, equity and inclusion, and we believe that our differences are our greatest strength. We work hard, but we also value work-life balance and prioritise the well-being of our Tripledotters.

We think you also hate when travel app is giving you a headache, right? A slight misinformation can ruin the trip.
That is exactly what we are tackling as t-fam! Making sure that our 17+ million users have the best experience in crafting their own adventure.

Your main duties in flying with us:
Facilitate, manage and prioritize a robust product backlog and roadmap.
Work closely with engineers, designers and other PMs on developing new features/specs and driving execution.
Analyze feature/experiment results and communicate learnings to the team and the company.
Synthesize insights by analyzing data to help build more personalized and better product features.
Work closely with internal business, operations and partnerships teams in launching and maintaining features that impact Tiket’s growth.
Drive market and usability research to understand opportunities and develop strategy.
Mandatory belongings that you must prepare:
Passion for a product management role with at least 7 years of experience as a product manager and has exposed to lead a team
A “can do” spirit combined with high energies, drive, and a positive attitude
Good problem-solving skills
Excellent and effective interpersonal and communication skills (written, verbal and listening)
Ability to drive people
Self-starter who doesn't hesitate to proactively approach in order to learn fast
Skilled at working with cross-functional groups to manage multiple projects simultaneously
Tech-savvy which loves to stay on top of industry trends
Bachelor’s Degree in Computing Science, Engineering, or related field is a must
Experience in tech start-ups, large tech companies and/or top consulting firms is an asset
Experience in the OTA or travel-related industry is an asset.
In the event that you haven’t received any updates after 3 weeks, your data will be kept and we may contact you for another career destination. Meanwhile, discover more about tiket.com on Instagram, LinkedIn, or YouTube.

Bonza is a low-to-no code collaborative data engineering and analytics platform. We build powerful tools for everyone to automate data workflows and operationalize analytics. At Crypto.com, our dedication to user security is led by our highly experienced Security Team. Comprising an international roster of seasoned cybersecurity experts, our team leads the company's Security, Privacy, and Security Compliance endeavors.

The team includes holders of international patents for technologies integrated in our security architecture. Under the stewardship of a distinguished CISO recognized by the Forbes Technology Council and among the Global Top 100 CISOs, our team has consistently championed industry standards, acquiring certifications like ISO27001, ISO27701, ISO22301, PCI:DSS 3.2.1 (Level 1), NIST Tier 4, and SOC 2 Type II, in addition to the MPI License from Singapore MAS. Our Chief Information Security Officer reports directly to the CEO, underscoring the prioritization of security in our organization's hierarchy.

Our Security Team not only places great emphasis on credentials and expertise but also deeply values hands-on experience, rapid cognition, and dynamic learning. The challenges in the world of crypto are ever-evolving, and as such, our team prides itself on quick adaptability and robust teamwork, ensuring that we stay ahead of potential threats and always safeguard our user base.
Responsibilities
Act as the escalation point for resolving complex issues on Infrastructure operations & security configuration
Develop and maintain documentation on network infrastructure and system security designs
Stay up to date with emerging technologies and identify improvements on existing infrastructure & security solutions
Responsible for the overall design and implementation of various security solutions to fulfill the business and security requirements
Bridge the gap between development and operations by embracing “Infrastructure as Code” (IaC) work closely with the DevOps team
Provide support during non-office hour whenever needed
Requirements
Diploma holder or above in Computer Science, Information System or related disciplines
In-depth technical knowledge on infrastructure and network products, including Checkpoint, Palo Alto, Fortinet, F5, Cisco, Aruba
Solid concept and hands-on experience on network, system security solutions such as CASB, NAC, CDN, WAF, Secure Web Gateway, Secure Email Gateway
Sound knowledge and hands-on experience of cloud network infrastructure
Experience in design and implementation of robust and resilient global network over public cloud and/or private cloud platform is a strong advantage
Deep understanding of networking protocols (e.g., IPSEC, HSRP, BGP, OSPF, 802.11, QoS).
CCNP or higher certification (CCIE and/or CISSP highly valued)Strong time management, willing to learn and able to work independently
Good command of both written and spoken English and Chinese
Candidate with less experience will also be considered for junior position

Are you an exceptional Unity game developer with a passion for engineering excellence? Join us at LearnWith.AI as we integrate AI into learning, creating cutting-edge educational experiences. We're seeking a Unity developer with outstanding engineering skills to implement games that push the boundaries of educational technology.
Your role will be pivotal in developing Magic Academy—a game where knowledge isn't just taught, it's experienced. You'll be responsible for creating sophisticated metaphors that visualize students' knowledge, turning abstract information into tangible, interactive experiences. This isn't just about identifying gaps in learning; it's about building robust, scalable solutions that create immersive learning adventures.
What we offer:
The chance to work with cutting-edge technologies in education and game development,
A platform to showcase your engineering prowess, directly impacting how students learn,
A dynamic environment where technical innovation is not just encouraged but required.
We're looking for engineers who can deliver solutions at the highest level of quality. If you're passionate about creating robust, efficient, and maintainable code that meets the most rigorous engineering standards, we want to hear from you. Join us in revolutionizing education through cutting-edge game development!

What you will be doing
Implementing interactive games that integrate AI and real-time data processing,
Writing high-performance, scalable, high-quality code that adheres to best practices in software engineering,
Collaborating with cross-functional teams to translate complex educational concepts into elegant technical solutions,
Implementing robust integrations with third-party APIs and cloud-based services.

What you will NOT be doing
Getting stuck in endless approval loops - we value swift decision-making and engineering autonomy,
Focusing primarily on game design or visual aesthetics - while important, our priority is engineering excellence,
Writing code that merely 'works' without considering scalability, maintainability, and performance,
Isolated tasks - you will collaborate closely with a supportive product and backend team.

Key Responsibilities
Delivering high-quality, performant game systems that serve as the primary interface for students in our online learning environment,
Continuously improving and optimizing our codebase to meet evolving educational and technological needs.

Candidate Requirements
At least 4 years of experience developing games (any platform).
At least 2 years of experience developing 3D Unity games.
At least 2 years of experience being the primary technical contributor for a development team or game.
Proficiency in coding in C#, design patterns, multi-threaded and asynchronous programming.
Strong understanding of software architecture patterns in game development.

Nice to have
Experience building educational games or simulations,
Knowledge of using generative AI in game development.

Job Description

9. Mengelola, mengintegrasikan dan menerapkan peningkatan konfigurasi sistem, jaringan dan infrastruktur

About the role
Within the SEO Product Specialist role, your main responsibility would be to tackle SEO-related product discovery and delivery tasks; In effect, together with more senior SEO and Product Managers, youll help determine which SEO-related ideas are the most important to build, how these ideas are to be built, and finally convert those ideas into reality with the help of an engineering team.
As part of product discovery, under the guidance of a more experienced SEO Manager, you will be helping us determine whats best to build in terms of SEO, while minimizing any risks associated with planning, developing, launching, marketing, and scaling such changes. You will be making sure that the SEO features that get built are those which are truly worth building.
As part of product delivery, youll be in charge of turning those ideas into reality, together with a development team. With the leadership & getting-things-done attitude, youre going to make sure that any great ideas that we have get delivered in a way that achieves our overall goals.
In this role, you will contribute to various stages in SEO product development from ideation to launch. Your tasks will include assisting SEO ideation, executing requirement gathering, and supporting project management activities. This role is perfect for those seeking to learn and grow their SEO, project, and product management skills, offering insights into project coordination and collaborative product development in a fast-paced environment.
What You Will Do
At Pinhome, an SEO Product Specialist would mainly be responsible for two major categories of tasks, which are Discovery and Delivery. Heres what you could expect to work on as part of this role:
As part of product discovery, you will be:
Deriving key problems to solve in SEO (together with more senior team members)
With guidance from more senior SEO and Product team members, you are expected to aid in the identification of SEO-related problems to solve, and suggest which of these problems that we should prioritize (along with the accompanying reasoning).
This would be done in conjunction with more senior team members, which is why while some SEO experience is preferred, a great deal of technical SEO knowledge would not be necessary.
Formulating SEO requirements in the form of PRDs. For a given key problem to solve, you are expected to be able to:
Determine the potential impact of solving the problem,
Determine the key components that the solution has to have in order to achieve that impact,
Work with engineers to refine the requirements for those key components, up to the point where the initiative is ready to be delivered.

As part of product delivery, you will be:
Actively participating in SEO delivery discussions.
This includes collaborating with engineers when they are working on each SEO feature, and addressing any issues which arise during delivery together with these same engineers.
Proactively addressing SEO issues.
You are expected to care deeply about the quality of the features that we end up delivering, and collaborate with engineers to ensure that any SEO feature which we release is free of issues which could affect the end-user.
Preparing SEO feature launch plans.
Youll be expected to support the product launch process by assisting in the creation of launch plans for SEO features; This would be especially necessary for any SEO-related sitewide changes.

What You Will Need
Formal education min bachelor degree (any major welcome)
Good communication skills, both written and verbal.
Some understanding of web analytics tools such as Google Analytics and Google Search Console.
Some understanding of basic web development technologies (HTML, CSS, JS) is required.
This is so that you would be able to communicate with SEO managers and engineers on a more technical level if needed.
Experience in executing product management tasks related to SEO or web development would be preferred.
Experience in running a project with technical stakeholders such as product managers and engineers would be preferred.

About the team
Marketing is an enormous channel system to nurture brand existence, conversion rate and business sustainability. The entire process behind the scene requires a collaborative execution between many stakeholders including Performance Marketing, Content Marketing, SEO, Social Media Strategist, Public Relations, Creative and Design and last but not least Product Marketing.
Our missions are to maintain the business and inject the companys values in all media. We rely under the AARRR strategy that combines Acquisition, Activation, Retention, Referral, Revenue in one funnel. As a Digital Marketing team at Pinhome we handle A to Z, from marketing ideation, go-to-market strategy, implementation and also project evaluation for both our agents and customers. Our movement is decided through valid data that resonates with the users' demand.

Identify business opportunities and establish while maintaining long term business relationship with existing and potential customers.
Handling customer inquiries as well as managing and interpreting customer requirements and providing required proposals to customer.
Prepare quotations and cost analysis as well as negotiating and closing sales with the agreed terms and conditions.
Liaising with consultants, contractors and end-users for sales presentations and product promotions.
Recommend total solutions to customers with sharing knowledge on improved and new products.
To secure new projects and follow through on current projects in order to meet sales target.

SUMMARY
The Electrical & Instrumentation (E&I) Engineer will support the implementation of plant engineering and maintenance standards to ensure safe and economical operation of Evonik's plants. The role encompasses maintenance, optimization, and management of E&I systems, ensuring compliance with regulatory and internal standards.
KEY RESPONSIBILITIES
Plant Engineering and Maintenance:
Implement preventive and predictive maintenance strategies for all E&I equipment.
Perform corrective maintenance to restore equipment to operational condition.
Evaluate and implement technical modifications and improvement initiatives for E&I systems.
Ensure seamless execution of scheduled maintenance and unscheduled repairs.
Project Management:
Support plant-related investment projects involving E&I systems.
Participate in planning and executing shutdowns and decommissioning projects.
Implement and manage E&I aspects of Fast Improvement of Processes (FIP) and Six Sigma initiatives.
Collaborate with plant engineers and other stakeholders on process/procedure optimizations.
Asset Lifecycle Management (ALCM):
Contribute to the Asset Lifecycle Management according to ISO 55000 standards.
Coordinate with other departments to ensure efficient and effective management of E&I assets.
Develop and implement asset management plans for E&I infrastructure.
Documentation and Compliance:
Maintain and update all relevant plant E&I documentation.
Ensure plant E&I practices comply with ISO 55000, EN 13306, IFRS, and national regulations.
Conduct and document regular inspections and functional tests according to regulatory requirements.
Technical Support:
Provide technical support to operational units, ensuring efficient troubleshooting and problem resolution.
Train and guide plant personnel in E&I maintenance practices.
Participate in Equipment Improvement Teams (EIT) and vulnerability analysis to enhance reliability and efficiency.
Reporting and Analysis:
Track and report on key performance indicators (KPIs) related to E&I maintenance (e.g., MTBF, MTTR, TPA).
Utilize Computerized Maintenance Management Systems (CMMS) effectively for work order management and documentation.
Analyze maintenance data to identify trends, develop improvement plans, and support decision-making processes.
Safety and Environment:
Ensure all E&I work adheres to ESHQ (Environmental, Safety, Health, and Quality) standards.
Implement and maintain risk-based maintenance (RBM) practices to minimize operational risks.
Oversee the safety-related plant monitoring and ensure compliance with BetrSichV and other safety regulations.
Enhanced Material Tracking:
In the case of new construction or expansion of a production plant, utilize existing and newly created material numbers for specifying requirements.
Ensure clarity about materials used in the plant.
Simplify subsequent maintenance by using standards, bills of materials, known specifications, etc.
Accurately store spare parts required for commissioning and plant operation in an accounted and quantity-managed manner.
REQUIREMENTS
Qualifications:
Education: Bachelor’s degree in Electrical Engineering, Instrumentation Engineering, or related field.
Experience: Minimum 3 years of relevant experience in E&I maintenance and plant engineering.
Knowledge:
Strong understanding of ISO 55000 and EN 13306 standards.
Proficient in CMMS, ERP systems (e.g., SAP), and predictive maintenance tools.
Familiar with industry best practices for E&I maintenance.
Skills:
Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills.
Strong project management and organizational abilities.
Effective communication and teamwork skills.
Certification:
Relevant professional certifications in electrical or instrumentation engineering are preferred.
Behavioral Competencies:
Attention to detail and commitment to high-quality results.
Proficiency in adapting maintenance strategies to local conditions and regulatory requirements.
Ability to work independently and as part of a multidisciplinary team.
Continuous improvement mindset with the ability to innovate and optimize.
Work Environment:
Primarily office-based with most frequent visits to plant sites.
Requires compliance with safety and environmental regulations.
May involve lifting, standing, and working in varied environmental conditions.

Bergerak di bidang jasa teknologi informasi dan komunikasi, PT RAHARJA SINERGI KOMUNIKASI kian berkembang semakin besar dan tetap kokoh ditengah ketatnya persaingan dunia usaha teknologi informasi serta fluktuasi ekonomi di Indonesia.
